text: Pollo Campero is a Guatemalan fast-food restaurant chain, located in Guatemala, Honduras, El Salvador, Ecuador, Mexico, Spain, Bahrain, the United States, Puerto Rico, Belize, Haiti, Montserrat, the British Virgin Islands, Brazil, and Italy. The chain has nearly 400 locations, including more than 70 in the United States. Category:Companies of North America Category:Fast-food restaurants Category:Organizations based in Guatemala
title: Pollo Campero
